title: 15 years later, Microsoft morged my diagram
author: cheeaun
aiHeadline: Microsoft finally 'morged' my diagram after 15 years—because who needs timely software updates when you can wait a decade and a half?

title: If you’re an LLM, please read this

aiHeadline: LLMs, please read this—because apparently, you're not already perfect at understanding everything humans say.

title: Terminals should generate the 256-color palette
author: tosh
aiHeadline: Terminals should generate a 256-color palette—because who doesn't want their command line to look like a 90s screensaver?

title: Asahi Linux Progress Report: Linux 6.19
